title: Asakusa: Start Your Day at a Morning Cafe
description: Discover cafes in Asakusa, brimming with old Tokyo charm, where you can leisurely enjoy your morning. content:
# Asakusa: Start Your Day at a Morning Cafe

Unlike the bustling daytime filled with tourists, morning in Asakusa offers a unique tranquility inherent to its old Tokyo charm. From long-established coffee shops where locals gather to specialty cafes offering artisanal coffee, and even unique eateries where you can savor Taiwanese breakfast culture â€“ we introduce you to places where you can comfortably start your day in the quiet ambiance of morning.

## Long-Established Coffee Shops with Showa-Era Charm

<Place id="ChIJaf3ndr-OGGARnp-K8axmG1c" />

Nestled near Senso-ji Temple, this long-established coffee shop retains the nostalgic charm of the Showa era. Open from 7 AM, it offers a serene space beloved by local regulars in the quiet early morning of Asakusa. The aroma of carefully brewed coffee and freshly toasted bread welcomes you to a delightful morning moment. With a rich selection of sandwiches and bakery items, their morning sets offer high satisfaction in both quality and quantity, making them perfect for those who want a hearty breakfast. You can comfortably kickstart your day with the traditional coffee shop atmosphere and warm service.

## Specialty Coffee and a Peaceful Morning

<Place id="ChIJPc4iS7-OGGAR6lGkQAVVEpc" />

Tucked away in an Asakusa backstreet, this modern cafe specializes in exquisite specialty coffee. Its simple yet sophisticated interior provides the perfect setting for a quiet morning. Each cup of coffee is meticulously brewed, resulting in a rich and flavorful drink that fully brings out the unique characteristics of the beans. A variety of light meal options are available, offering breakfasts thoughtfully paired with their coffee. Slightly removed from the tourist bustle, it's a hidden gem frequented by locals and discerning travelers alike. Its tranquil ambiance makes it ideal for morning reading or working on your laptop.

## Experience Taiwanese Breakfast Culture

<Place id="ChIJe53TafiPGGAR9fnzJ9oqg4g" />

In Asakusa, you can discover Taiwanese breakfast culture at this specialty shop offering steamed buns and Taiwanese vermicelli soup. Steamed buns, a staple Taiwanese breakfast, boast a fluffy and chewy texture and can be enjoyed with various fillings. Taiwanese vermicelli soup features delicate noodles intertwined in a mild-flavored broth, making it a comforting dish for your morning stomach. A cafe space is also available, perfect for relaxing with Taiwanese tea or coffee. This is a valuable spot to experience authentic Taiwanese breakfast culture, still a rarity in Japan. Highly recommended for those who wish to immerse themselves in an exotic atmosphere from the start of their day.

## Asakusa Mornings: Start Your Day Your Way

Whether it's a long-established coffee shop with Showa-era charm, a serene space for specialty coffee, or the vibrant flavors of Taiwanese breakfast culture, Asakusa offers a delightful array of morning cafes to suit every taste and mood. Why not discover your perfect start to the day in the quiet hours before the crowds arrive, soaking in the local atmosphere?
